name: Strikey Sisters
overview: Say hello to a fantasy themed arcade action brick breaker! Featuring cute characters, silly humor, powerful magic, crazy boss battles, and even a local 2 player co-op mode!   - Fast-paced brick breaker action! - Intense boss battles! - Local 2 player co-op mode. - Three difficulty modes. - Travel and conquer the world map in any order you want! - Unique player, ball, and spell power-ups! - Highly replayable! Uncover all the map, collect gems, unlock secret areas and extra levels, and complete the bestiary! - Polished and colorful pixel art visuals. - Catchy synth-fantasy soundtrack. - Cheesy 90's game voice acting!
